page.title: 15Kelso Entertainment
page.content: There are lots of ways to{entertain {yourself here in Kelso.}These include playing{golf,}watching{horse racing,} going{ice skating,}playing{bingo,} watching{rugby}or{cricket,}or even attending the many{Civic Week}events. We have a good variety of concerts and plays to entertain you at night. These are usually held in the{Tait Hall,}the {High School}or in one of the many{ {pubs, hotels}or{clubs.}There are three {Athletics Clubs:}two are professional and one is amateur. Also there is { {cricket coaching}for all ages: colts, juniors and seniors.{Bingo}is held on Thursday nights.{Football}is another sport that is keenly played in Kelso. There are three clubs: Kelso United, Kelso Thistle and Kelso Amateurs. We also have a local{Operatic group}and a {Round Table}which organises many fund-raising events.
